author: Simon Difford
description: Robust flavours of overproof rum and Chartreuse combine with Dutch genever in this Last Word-like cocktail.
name: Waters of Chaos
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)
10 ml Chilled water (omit if wet ice)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
